segment.source: Investigate machines in the Windows Defender ATP Machines view
segment.target: Investigate machines in the Windows Defender ATP Machines view

segment.source: Investigate affected machines in your network by reviewing alerts, network connection information, and service health on the Machines view.
segment.target: Investigate affected machines in your network by reviewing alerts, network connection information, and service health on the Machines view.

segment.source: Investigate machines in the Windows Defender ATP Machines view
segment.target: Investigate machines in the Windows Defender ATP Machines view

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later
segment.target: Windows 10 Insider Preview Build 14332 or later

segment.source: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)
segment.target: Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection (Windows Defender ATP)

segment.source: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.
segment.target: [Some information relates to pre-released product which may be substantially modified before it's commercially released.

segment.source: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]
segment.target: Microsoft makes no warranties, express or implied, with respect to the information provided here.]

segment.source: The Machines view shows a list of the machines in your network, the corresponding number of active alerts for each machine categorized by alert severity levels, and the number of active malware detections.
segment.target: The Machines view shows a list of the machines in your network, the corresponding number of active alerts for each machine categorized by alert severity levels, and the number of active malware detections.

segment.source: This view allows you to identify machines with the highest risk at a glance, and keep track of all the machines that are reporting telemetry in your network.
segment.target: This view allows you to identify machines with the highest risk at a glance, and keep track of all the machines that are reporting telemetry in your network.

segment.source: Use the Machines view in these two main scenarios:
segment.target: Use the Machines view in these two main scenarios:

segment.source: During onboarding
segment.target: During onboarding

segment.source: During the onboarding process, the Machines view gradually gets populated with endpoints as they begin to report telemetry.
segment.target: During the onboarding process, the Machines view gradually gets populated with endpoints as they begin to report telemetry.

segment.source: Use this view to track your onboarded endpoints as they appear.
segment.target: Use this view to track your onboarded endpoints as they appear.

segment.source: Use the available features to sort and filer to see which endpoints have most recently reported telemetry, or download the complete endpoint list as a CSV file for offline analysis.
segment.target: Use the available features to sort and filer to see which endpoints have most recently reported telemetry, or download the complete endpoint list as a CSV file for offline analysis.

segment.source: Day-to-day work
segment.target: Day-to-day work

segment.source: The Machines view enables you to identify machines that are most at risk in a glance.
segment.target: The Machines view enables you to identify machines that are most at risk in a glance.

segment.source: High-risk machines are those with the greatest number and highest-severity alerts.
segment.target: High-risk machines are those with the greatest number and highest-severity alerts.

segment.source: By sorting the machines by risk, you'll be able to identify the most vulnerable machines and take action on them.
segment.target: By sorting the machines by risk, you'll be able to identify the most vulnerable machines and take action on them.

segment.source: The Machines view contains the following columns:
segment.target: The Machines view contains the following columns:

segment.source: Machine name - the name or GUID of the machine
segment.target: Machine name - the name or GUID of the machine

segment.source: Domain - the domain the machine belongs to
segment.target: Domain - the domain the machine belongs to

segment.source: Last seen - when the machine last reported telemetry
segment.target: Last seen - when the machine last reported telemetry

segment.source: Internal IP - the local internal Internet Protocol (IP) address of the machine
segment.target: Internal IP - the local internal Internet Protocol (IP) address of the machine

segment.source: Active Alerts - the number of alerts reported by the machine by severity
segment.target: Active Alerts - the number of alerts reported by the machine by severity

segment.source: Active malware detections - the number of active malware detections reported by the machine
segment.target: Active malware detections - the number of active malware detections reported by the machine

segment.source: Note The Active alerts and Active malware detections filter column will only appear if your endpoints are using Windows Defender as the default real-time protection antimalware product.
segment.target: Note The Active alerts and Active malware detections filter column will only appear if your endpoints are using Windows Defender as the default real-time protection antimalware product.

segment.source: Click any column header to sort the view in ascending or descending order.
segment.target: Click any column header to sort the view in ascending or descending order.

segment.source: Screenshot of the Machines view on the portal
segment.target: Screenshot of the Machines view on the portal

segment.source: You can sort the Machines view by Machine name, Last seen, IP, Active Alerts, and Active malware detections.
segment.target: You can sort the Machines view by Machine name, Last seen, IP, Active Alerts, and Active malware detections.

segment.source: Scroll down the Machines view to see additional machines.
segment.target: Scroll down the Machines view to see additional machines.

segment.source: The view contains two filters: time and threat category.
segment.target: The view contains two filters: time and threat category.

segment.source: You can filter the view by the following time periods:
segment.target: You can filter the view by the following time periods:

segment.source: 1 day
segment.target: 1 day

segment.source: 3 days
segment.target: 3 days

segment.source: 7 days
segment.target: 7 days

segment.source: 30 days
segment.target: 30 days

segment.source: 6 months
segment.target: 6 months

segment.source: Note When you select a time period, the list will only display machines that reported within the selected time period.
segment.target: Note When you select a time period, the list will only display machines that reported within the selected time period.

segment.source: For example, selecting 1 day will only display a list of machines that reported telemetry within the last 24-hour period.
segment.target: For example, selecting 1 day will only display a list of machines that reported telemetry within the last 24-hour period.

segment.source: The threat category filter lets you filter the view by the following categories:
segment.target: The threat category filter lets you filter the view by the following categories:

segment.source: Password stealer
segment.target: Password stealer

segment.source: Ransomware
segment.target: Ransomware

segment.source: Exploit
segment.target: Exploit

segment.source: Threat
segment.target: Threat

segment.source: Low severity
segment.target: Low severity

segment.source: See the Investigate machines with active alerts topic for a description of each category.
segment.target: See the Investigate machines with active alerts topic for a description of each category.

segment.source: You can also download a full list of all the machines in your organization, in CSV format.
segment.target: You can also download a full list of all the machines in your organization, in CSV format.

segment.source: Click the Manage Alert menu icon The menu icon looks like three periods stacked on top of each other to download the entire list as a CSV file.
segment.target: Click the Manage Alert menu icon The menu icon looks like three periods stacked on top of each other to download the entire list as a CSV file.

segment.source: Note: Exporting the list depends on the number of machines in your organization.
segment.target: Note: Exporting the list depends on the number of machines in your organization.

segment.source: It can take a significant amount of time to download, depending on how large your organization is.
segment.target: It can take a significant amount of time to download, depending on how large your organization is.

segment.source: Exporting the list in CSV format displays the data in an unfiltered manner.
segment.target: Exporting the list in CSV format displays the data in an unfiltered manner.

segment.source: The CSV file will include all machines in the organization, regardless of any filtering applied in the view itself.
segment.target: The CSV file will include all machines in the organization, regardless of any filtering applied in the view itself.

segment.source: Investigate a machine
segment.target: Investigate a machine

segment.source: Investigate the details of an alert raised on a specific machine to identify other behaviors or events that might be related to the alert or the potential scope of breach.
segment.target: Investigate the details of an alert raised on a specific machine to identify other behaviors or events that might be related to the alert or the potential scope of breach.

segment.source: You can click on affected machines whenever you see them in the portal to open a detailed report about that machine.
segment.target: You can click on affected machines whenever you see them in the portal to open a detailed report about that machine.

segment.source: Affected machines are identified in the following areas:
segment.target: Affected machines are identified in the following areas:

segment.source: The Machines view
segment.target: The Machines view

segment.source: The Alerts queue
segment.target: The Alerts queue

segment.source: The Dashboard
segment.target: The Dashboard

segment.source: Any individual alert
segment.target: Any individual alert

segment.source: Any individual file details view
segment.target: Any individual file details view

segment.source: Any IP address or domain details view
segment.target: Any IP address or domain details view

segment.source: When you investigate a specific machine, you'll see:
segment.target: When you investigate a specific machine, you'll see:

segment.source: Machine details, Machine IP Addresses, and Machine Reporting
segment.target: Machine details, Machine IP Addresses, and Machine Reporting

segment.source: Alerts related to this machine
segment.target: Alerts related to this machine

segment.source: Machine timeline
segment.target: Machine timeline

segment.source: The machine details, IP, and reporting sections display some attributes of the machine such as its name, domain, OS, IP address, and how long it's been reporting telemetry to the Windows Defender ATP service.
segment.target: The machine details, IP, and reporting sections display some attributes of the machine such as its name, domain, OS, IP address, and how long it's been reporting telemetry to the Windows Defender ATP service.

segment.source: The Alerts related to this machine section provides a list of alerts that are associated with the machine.
segment.target: The Alerts related to this machine section provides a list of alerts that are associated with the machine.

segment.source: This list is a simplified version of the Alerts queue, and shows the date that the alert was detected, a short description of the alert, the alert's severity, the alert's threat category, and the alert's status in the queue.
segment.target: This list is a simplified version of the Alerts queue, and shows the date that the alert was detected, a short description of the alert, the alert's severity, the alert's threat category, and the alert's status in the queue.

segment.source: The Machine timeline section provides a chronological view of the events and associated alerts that have been observed on the machine.
segment.target: The Machine timeline section provides a chronological view of the events and associated alerts that have been observed on the machine.

segment.source: You'll see an aggregated view of alerts, a short description of the alert, details on the action taken, and which user ran the action.
segment.target: You'll see an aggregated view of alerts, a short description of the alert, details on the action taken, and which user ran the action.

segment.source: This helps you see significant activities or behaviors that occurred on a machine within your network in relation to a specific time frame.
segment.target: This helps you see significant activities or behaviors that occurred on a machine within your network in relation to a specific time frame.

segment.source: Several icons are used to identify various detections and their current state.
segment.target: Several icons are used to identify various detections and their current state.

segment.source: For more information, see Windows Defender ATP icons.
segment.target: For more information, see Windows Defender ATP icons.

segment.source: This feature also enables you to selectively drill down into a behavior or event that occurred within a given time period.
segment.target: This feature also enables you to selectively drill down into a behavior or event that occurred within a given time period.

segment.source: You can view the temporal sequence of events that occurred on a machine over a specified time period.
segment.target: You can view the temporal sequence of events that occurred on a machine over a specified time period.

segment.source: The timeline shows an interactive history of the alerts seen on a machine
segment.target: The timeline shows an interactive history of the alerts seen on a machine

segment.source: Use the search bar to look for specific alerts or files associated with the machine.
segment.target: Use the search bar to look for specific alerts or files associated with the machine.

segment.source: You can also filter by:
segment.target: You can also filter by:

segment.source: Signed or unsigned files
segment.target: Signed or unsigned files

segment.source: Detections mode: displays Windows ATP Alerts and detections
segment.target: Detections mode: displays Windows ATP Alerts and detections

segment.source: Behaviors mode: displays "detections" and selected events of interest
segment.target: Behaviors mode: displays "detections" and selected events of interest

segment.source: Verbose mode: displays "behaviors" (including "detections"), and all reported events
segment.target: Verbose mode: displays "behaviors" (including "detections"), and all reported events

segment.source: Logged on users, System, Network, or Local service
segment.target: Logged on users, System, Network, or Local service

segment.source: Use the time-based slider to filter events from a specific date.
segment.target: Use the time-based slider to filter events from a specific date.

segment.source: By default, the machine timeline is set to display the events of the current day.
segment.target: By default, the machine timeline is set to display the events of the current day.

segment.source: Using the slider updates the listed alerts to the date that you select.
segment.target: Using the slider updates the listed alerts to the date that you select.

segment.source: Displayed events are filtered from that date and older.
segment.target: Displayed events are filtered from that date and older.

segment.source: The slider is helpful when you're investigating a particular alert on a machine.
segment.target: The slider is helpful when you're investigating a particular alert on a machine.

segment.source: You can navigate from the Alerts view and click on the machine associated with the alert to jump to the specific date when the alert was observed, enabling you to investigate the events that took place around the alert.
segment.target: You can navigate from the Alerts view and click on the machine associated with the alert to jump to the specific date when the alert was observed, enabling you to investigate the events that took place around the alert.

segment.source: From the Machine view, you can also navigate to the file, IP, or URL view and the timeline associated with an alert is retained, helping you view the investigation from different angles and retain the context of the event time line.
segment.target: From the Machine view, you can also navigate to the file, IP, or URL view and the timeline associated with an alert is retained, helping you view the investigation from different angles and retain the context of the event time line.

segment.source: From the list of events that are displayed in the timeline, you can examine the behaviors or events in to help identify indicators of interests such as files and IP addresses to help determine the scope of a breach.
segment.target: From the list of events that are displayed in the timeline, you can examine the behaviors or events in to help identify indicators of interests such as files and IP addresses to help determine the scope of a breach.

segment.source: You can then use the information to respond to events and keep your system secure.
segment.target: You can then use the information to respond to events and keep your system secure.

segment.source: Windows Defender ATP monitors and captures questionable behavior on Windows 10 machines and displays the process tree flow in the Machine timeline.
segment.target: Windows Defender ATP monitors and captures questionable behavior on Windows 10 machines and displays the process tree flow in the Machine timeline.

segment.source: This gives you better context of the behavior which can contribute to understanding the correlation between events, files, and IP addresses in relation to the machine.
segment.target: This gives you better context of the behavior which can contribute to understanding the correlation between events, files, and IP addresses in relation to the machine.

segment.source: The process tree shows you a hierarchical history of processes and events on the machine
segment.target: The process tree shows you a hierarchical history of processes and events on the machine

segment.source: Investigate a machine:
segment.target: Investigate a machine:

segment.source: Select the machine that you want to investigate.
segment.target: Select the machine that you want to investigate.

segment.source: You can select or search a machine from any of the following views:
segment.target: You can select or search a machine from any of the following views:

segment.source: Dashboard - click the machine name from the Top machines with active alerts section
segment.target: Dashboard - click the machine name from the Top machines with active alerts section

segment.source: Alerts queue - click the machine name beside the machine icon
segment.target: Alerts queue - click the machine name beside the machine icon

segment.source: Machines view - click the heading of the machine name
segment.target: Machines view - click the heading of the machine name

segment.source: Search box - select Machine from the drop-down menu and enter the machine name
segment.target: Search box - select Machine from the drop-down menu and enter the machine name

segment.source: Information about the specific machine is displayed.
segment.target: Information about the specific machine is displayed.

segment.source: Use the machine timeline
segment.target: Use the machine timeline

segment.source: Use the sort and filter feature to narrow down the search results.
segment.target: Use the sort and filter feature to narrow down the search results.

segment.source: Use the timeline search box to filter specific indicators that appear in the machine timeline.
segment.target: Use the timeline search box to filter specific indicators that appear in the machine timeline.

segment.source: Click the expand icon
segment.target: Click the expand icon

segment.source: The expand icon looks like a plus symbol
segment.target: The expand icon looks like a plus symbol

segment.source: in the timeline row or click anywhere on the row to see additional information about the alert, behavior, or event.
segment.target: in the timeline row or click anywhere on the row to see additional information about the alert, behavior, or event.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.target: View the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection Dashboard

segment.source: View and organize the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection Alerts queue
segment.target: View and organize the Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection Alerts queue

segment.source: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection alerts
segment.target: Investigate Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection alerts

segment.source: Investigate a file associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
segment.target: Investigate a file associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert

segment.source: Investigate an IP address associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
segment.target: Investigate an IP address associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert

segment.source: Investigate a domain associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert
segment.target: Investigate a domain associated with a Windows Defender ATP alert

segment.target: Manage Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection alerts
